product_name: Yurbuds Focus Limited Edition Wireless Earbuds
long_description: Cut the cord and unleash your inner athlete with the Yurbuds Focus Limited Edition Wireless Earbuds. These stereo Bluetooth(R) earphones lock into place and give you freedom to move. 15mm drivers deliver big sound from any Bluetooth-enabled device, providing the motivation you need to keep going with no strings attached. Sweat- and water-resistant earphones feature 3-button track/call control with a wind-blocking microphone designed for call clarity. Athlete-tested smart battery lasts up to 6 hrs. and provides visual and audible indicators when running low. Earbuds allow more ambient noise than most other earphones at the same volume levels for enhanced awareness of your surroundings. Yurbuds TwistLock(TM) technology locks earbuds into place for a secure fit, even under intense workout conditions. Made with flexible silicone, Yurbuds are ultrasoft and comfortable for hours on end; they are ergonomically designed to avoid nerve-rich areas of the ear. Yurbuds Focus Limited Edition Wireless Earbuds feature a dedicated pairing button for simple 1-touch pairing, woven cloth cord and IPX5 resistance to sweat and water.
short_description: Cut the cord and unleash your inner athlete with the Yurbuds Focus Limited Edition Wireless Earbuds. These stereo Bluetooth(R) earphones lock into place and give you freedom to move.
